InfluenceRule.name: Clumsy people more likely to make convoflirts

More likely to convoflirt someone with a history of romance

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% flirted with %r%
%i% tried to hit on %r%
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% being cute with %r%
%i% tried to flirt with %r%
%i% unwisely flirted with %r%
%i% flirted with %r% in like a totally cool way
%r% got bored with %ip% constant flirting
%i% tried to flirt with %r% by insulting %pron(r,him/her)%
%i% swept %r% off %pron(r,his/her)% feet with all that flirting
%r% got tired of %i% beating around the bush
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too inarticulate to flirt well but %rs% %pron(r,was/were)% still flattered
%i% tried so hard to flirt with %r% but couldn't get the words out
%i% hit on %r% even though %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(r,was/were)% dating %prons(i,his/her)% friend, %o%
%i% tried to flirt with %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were friends
%list(i,r,and)% were just friends but then %list(i,r,we/they)% kindled a romance
%i% tried to flirt with %r% without demonstrating much flair for timing
%i% tried to flirt with %r% at exactly the right time
%i% got a reputation as a serial flirter
%i% tried flirting with %r%, but %prons(r,he/she)% %pron(i,was/were)% just a shadow of the past
%o% saw future visions of %list(i,r,and)% totally making out
%i% flirted with %prons(i,his/her)% enemy's %gender(r,boyfriend,girlfriend)%
%i% didn't have the moves to get with %prons(i,his/her)% enemy's %gender(r,bf,gf)%
%i% flirted with %r%, %pron(i,his/her)% old flame
%i% flirted with %r% just because %list(i,r,we/they)% used to date but it was totally inappropriate
%i% scandalously flirted with %r%, %pron(i,his/her)% new %gender(r,boytoy,mistress)%
%i% totally flirted with %r%, %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend's %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend
%i% totally tried to flirt with %r%, %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend's %gender(i,boy,girl)%friend, and got shot down hard
%i% flirted with %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were friends but %rs% %pron(r,was/were)% cool with it

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%... %rand(I think I dropped something... my jaw,I think you have something in your eye... oh! It's just a sparkle,I was wondering... How do you wear your backpack? Don't your angel wings get in the way?,I never used to have a favorite color... until I saw your eyes)%.

%greeting%, %r%... %rand(Are your feathers ruffled? Uh... because angels and feathers,Do you smell dead people? ...because looks could kill. And I'm... I mean. You're,I have skin cancer! Because... I always want to be next to you and you're like the sun... my sun... uh,I don't have any arms! Yeah. Uh. Cause you complete me. So like your arms are like my)%...no wait, let met start that again.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %rand(Is this for real? Please say that's not for real.,Whatever.,Why don't you make like a tree and shut up.,How about we both pretend this never happened.,Let's not and say we did. Except without that second part.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %random(hot stuff,good lookin',gorgeous)%. Who's my favorite %gender(r,hunk of man,sexy mama)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(I hope it's still me!,Why... is it me?,Are you talking about *me*?)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %random(You know it,You bet,Always)%, %sweetie%.
Hey, %sweetie%. Has anyone ever told you you have beautiful %rand(fingers,elbows,feet,nostrils,ears,mojo,skin,shoelaces)%?
Hey, %r%. Damn, %gender(r,man,girl)%, you should be careful the cops don't see you. It's got to be illegal to look that good.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I'm going to be arrested for assault in a second if you don't get out of my face.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%... I just wanted to tell you how gorgeous you are.
No really, your eyes are like tranquil pools of majestic beauty.
Just your existence lights up a room and makes a chorus of angels sing.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Look, %i%. We're already dating. You don't need to keep trying to 'woo' me.
In fact, I'm getting a little sick of it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... sure... sorry I guess.
If it isn't my favorite, most-disliked person. I must say, you're looking especially %pejorative%ish today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Is that supposed to be some sort of compliment?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %pejorative%ish? Absolutely. It's only the highest caliber of compliment for someone like yourself.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Wait a minute. Are you *flirting* with me?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe. Are you flirting with me?
Mmm, if it isn't %r%.
I must say, you're looking particularly ravishing today.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You sweep me off my feet everytime you open those lips of yours.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Lips? If I had to be stuck in a desert with only one thing, I'd bring those luscious lips of yours to stave away my thirst.
The beautiful %gender(r,prince,princess)% %r% graces me with %pron(r,his/her)% presence. To what do I owe this honor?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: But... I kind of wish you'd stop beating around the bush.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I just thought I'd tell you how wonderful you are.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh no, I appreciate it. I mean, I'm flattered. It's just.... don't you maybe want to ask me something?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Whatever do you mean, my %gender(r,king,queen)%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Never mind. I'm probably just being stupid.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uhhmmm.... hehehe.... uhhhh....

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Haha, you're funny %i%. What are you trying to say?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, like... uhhhh.... you're %gender(r,hot,pretty)%.
Oh, %r%. I just wanted to tell you how pur... pri...
You know, you're really perufmakilsm...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %random(Is that some sort of religion?,Gesundheit.,I have no idea what that thing you just said is.)%

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Sorry... It's just really hard for me to say what I'm trying to say. Give me a second...

Instantiation.name: Flirt - (SS7 Act-1) Person hits on friend's girlfriend/boyfriend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%.
How are you and %o% doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Idk, I don't feel like I'm that close with him...

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Well let me just say I love the way you look when you're thinking things over.
For you %sweetie%, anything.
Hey %r%.

I... uh... I just wanted to tell you %random(I think you're amazingly beautiful,you're the sweetest and kindest person I know,I think I'm falling in love with you,how much I care about you,how incredible you are)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OK that's totally gross. We're friends! I don't think of you in that way. At all.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh! Hehe heh, oh totally, no, me neither. Just joking around, that's all. Hey, what are you doing later?
Hey %r%.

I... uh... I just wanted to tell you %random(I think you're amazingly beautiful,you're the sweetest person I know,I think I'm falling in love with you,how much I care about you,how incredible you are)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I... can't say I haven't wondered whether the two of us could be together.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: That's all I ask.
%greeting%, my %r%.
Just to %random(see your pretty face again,breathe the same air you're breathing,hang out near a minor deity of romance,be near you again,bask in the beautiful garden that is your presence)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You have got to be joking. Five minutes ago %toc1%, and now you're flirting with me?
%random(Get a life,Grow up,Go away,Get lost,Take a hike,Pathetic)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.

Oh, nothing much. I just wanted to %random(see your pretty face again,breathe the same air you're breathing,hang out near a minor deity of romance,be near you again,bask in the beautiful garden that is your presence)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: ...but since %toc1% I suppose I'll let you get away with it. You can bask in my presence any time.

Instantiation.name: Flirt - Just flirted with someone else reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting%, %r%.
I just wanted to tell you I think you're the %random(cutest,hottest,sexiest,most amazing,most dateable,most kissable,swankiest)% %gender(r,guy,girl)% in school.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Because I just saw you trying some line on %o% over there. What, are you just working your way through everything that breathes?
%random(This conversation is over,Nice talking with you,Good luck,Give me a break)%.

Instantiation.name: Flirt - (SS8 Act-2) Scrooge meets the ghost of christmas past

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %r%, I... I don't entirely know why I'm doing this, but...
Our Mutual Friend %o% really wants me to like, apologize to you or something.
I think maybe %pron(o,he/she)% even wants us to get back together.
Weird, right?
OK %o%, I tried to deal with those double-ironed chains or whatever you were whining about.
Nothing doing, %pron(r,he/she)%'s totally ignoring me. Wait, what?
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Oh, I am not %o%, I am the Ghost of Christmas Past, merely assuming the form of %o%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Come off it, %o%, you're making me look like a %pejorative% in front of %r%.
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: I have also adopted %op% vocabulary - you are nothing more than a %pejorative%, %sweetie%. Hee hee.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: In everything that made my love of any worth or value in your sight.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: What are you talking about, %r%?
LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Again, %pron(r,he/she)% cannot hear you. These are shadows of things that have been.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If this had never been between us.
Tell me, would you seek me out and try to win me now? Ah, no!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Spirit! Remove me! I cannot bear it! It's way too freaky-deaky for me.

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: That these shadows are what they are, do not blame me!

Instantiation.name: Flirt - (SS8 Act-4) The Ghost of Christmas Future

LineOfDialogue.otherLine: Spirit! Reveal yourself! Make your presence known!
What... is this.. this is the shape of things to come?
I drove %pron(r,him/her)% away, and %pron(r,he/she)% found solace in my best friend.
Oh, spirit! Are these shadows of things that Will be, or are they shadows of things that May be, only?
Good Spirit! Assure me that I yet may change these shadows you have shown me, by an altered life.
I will honour Christmas in my heart, and try to keep it all the year. I'll also try to patch things up with %r%.

Instantiation.name: Flirt - I enemies with O but is hitting on O's gf/bf Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %greeting% %r%.
Just wondering why you would go out with that failure %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, stop making fun of my %gender(o,boyfriend,girlfriend)%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'm just saying %pron(o,he/she)% doesn't appreciate what %pron(o,he/she)%'s got. I mean, has %pron(o,he/she)% ever told you that you have the most beautiful eyes in the world?
I would.

Instantiation.name: Flirt - I enemies with O but is hitting on O's gf/bf Reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, why do you go out with that loser %o%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh please, %i%, spare me your playground conflict with my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: %gender(o,He,She)% doesn't appreciate you, %sweetie%. Has %pron(o,he/she)% ever told you that your eyes are like deep pits of glowy stars with meteors and comets and things?
....That sounded better in my head.
Why, it's that pretty face I used to love. How's tricks, %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OK, %i%. You seem to be in a pretty good mood.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You could always read my moods so well, %sweetie%. I miss that about you.
Why, it's that pretty face I used to love. How's tricks, %r%?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: OK, %i%. You seem to be in a pretty good mood.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You could always read my moods so well, %sweetie%. I miss that about you.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We're over, get it? You do *not* get to talk to me that way any more.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey beautiful, fancy meeting you here.
Don't you worry your pretty little head about %o%, %sweetie%. %pron(o,He/She)%'s old and busted. You're my new hotness.
%i%, it's only natural to be upset with me right now. But I wanted you to know...
I totally get what %o% sees in you. You're an amazingly %gender(r,attractive man,beautiful woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You think obvious flattery is going to make me forget how you stole my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, %pejorative%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe not. But think of it this way, %sweetie%. Maybe I didn't steal anything from you at all.
Maybe I gave you something beautiful.
I'll be here whenever you want to talk. Or more than talk.
%i%, it's only natural to be upset with me right now. But I wanted you to know...
I totally get what %o% sees in you. You're an amazingly %gender(r,attractive man,beautiful woman)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: You think obvious flattery is going to make me forget how you stole my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend, %pejorative%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Maybe not. But think of it this way, %sweetie%. Maybe I didn't steal anything from you at all.
Maybe I gave you something beautiful.
Hey %r%.
I... uh... I just wanted to tell you how... how amazingly cute I think you are.
I... uh... maybe?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Hey, it's okay. I'm flattered. And... I'll think about it.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Really?! You're the best, %r%.
